alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Cuyahoga; Geauga (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 19 at 1:07AM EST until December 19 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches for a total of 3 to 9 inches. Locally higher amounts near a foot possible in Ashtabula County. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Cuyahoga, Geauga and Ashtabula Inland counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue overnight and be heavy at times. The heaviest snow will fall away from the lakeshore in the higher elevations. A particularly heavy band is starting to set up across Ashtabula County and locally higher totals are possible there. Snow will diminish from west to east this morning. Temperatures will continue to to fall into the 20s with wind chills in the teens.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
